title: Crypto scam : Journalist Zeke Faux new book Number Go Up investigating the Tether cryptocurrency leads him into a dark world of slave labour in Cambodia .
body_text:
The mysterious WhatsApp message arrived one night in August last year, while I was out at a bar with a friend: “Hi David, I’m Vicky Ho don’t you remember me?”
This was strange. My name isn’t David, and I didn’t know anyone named Vicky. But I’d been getting a lot of seemingly misdirected messages on my phone.
